title: A Cooking Lesson from Big Bottom
description:
Host Nikki Boyer loves to eat, but she doesn’t really like to cook. Thankfully the chef from Sonoma County’s Big Bottom Market, Michael Volpatt, gives Nikki a lesson on how to make a quick meal with whatever she can find in her kitchen.

Follow Michael Volpatt

Visit Big Bottom Market

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
